name: Socket Climber
description:
Made during "Go Godot Jam 2"
Theme: Energy Source

You are a bot with a 5 second battery life. Plug yourself into sockets to stay powered up and use your power cable to swing up to the top of the level.

CONTROLS:

Use "AD" or "LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS" to move and "SPACEBAR" to jump.
Press "SPACEBAR" again near a socket to plug and use "AD" or "LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS" to control the swing speed.

CREDITS:
Game Design + Art - Galit Weisberg
Programming + Level Design - Moisés Peláez
Music - Max Nattrass
Fonts - venus rising, conthrax
